short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An auto channel points clicker extension for Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to collect Twitch channel points automatically. It currently clicks the button every 5 minute.

Reminder:
1. Please refresh the Twitch page after installing.

Future updates:
1. Allow users set the time interval and disable/enable extension via popup window.
